column4: Can someone give me a hand finding windows Atheros drivers for us with ndiswrapper?
Atheros lacks a download section and Acer, the makers of this laptop, lacks driver downloads.
what model number of acer? i have the same brand
first ls -l the file and look at the first column
thanks, now... i want to have my hdd mounted to a certain folder...
ok i have a hdd partitioned etc.. and i have to go to the disk utility every time i reboot to remount to the folder is there a way i can have it do it and stay?
thanks && do you know of the gl library file for php the name of the file?
php has a gl library? heh.
thought that was a purely CGI language.
